```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(gasmodel)
```

``` {r data}
t <- 22
n <- ncol(ice_hockey_championships$host)
y <- ice_hockey_championships$rankings[1:t, ]
x <- lapply(1:n, function(i) { ice_hockey_championships$host[1:t, i] })
```

``` {r distr}
distr(filter_type = "ranking")
```

``` {r pluce}
pluce_est <- gas(y = y, x = x, distr = "pluce",
                 coef_fix_special = c("zero_sum_intercept", "panel_structure"))
pluce_est
```
